DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect combine physiotherapy treatment ( include vestibular rehabilitation treatment cervical spine ) youth young adult ongoing symptom dizziness , neck pain headache follow sport-related concussion .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physiotherapy Individuals With Persistent Symptoms Following Concussion
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Sportrelated concussion per Third International Consensus Guidelines Persistent symptom ( great 10 day ) dizziness , unsteadiness , neck pain and/or headache report Sport Concussion Assessment Tool 2 ( SCAT2 ) Clinical examination finding suggest vestibular and/or cervical spine involvement Fracture , neurological condition , musculoskeletal injury ( cervical spine ) restrict activity medication affect neural adaptation
